basic.description:
Advanced motion picture production course. Each student produces a short documentary using video and/or 16mm film. Emphasis will be placed on unconventional approaches and techniques.
NOTE    Students may enroll in no more than on production course per academic year: FILM 351/3.0; FILM 352/3.0; FILM 355/6.0; FILM 365/6.0; FILM 375/6.0; FILM 385/6.0; FILM 410/3.0; FILM 451/3.0; FILM 460/6.0.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Documentary Production

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
